comment.author: 98199131@N04
comment._content:
Is this a connection to Susannah Smith b 1846 married to William Henry Hawley?  My Father is John Slee 1932 and there is no other Slee family in Ontario that is not connected some how.  I believe the connection is in the Nicholas Ward 1836 m Julia Wright 1831 USA and the William Henry Hawley 1847 m Susannah Smith b 1846.  See Slee Ward Jorgensen Reksten family tree on ancestry.ca
Diane Slee-Maves
celshouse@hotmail.ca

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/98199131@N04] Hi Diane - the people in this album are mostly descendants of Samuel See (1808-1854) and his sister Ann (1803-1871), who married Benjamin Smith (1808-1895). Not sure if that helps!
